description: Homer's epics, Hesiod's account of creation and his farmer's almanac, the tragedies of
5th-century Athens, the national epics of Ovid and Vergil: mythical patterns and images from
ancient texts still pervade our culture's music, drama, art and film. Many students plug
in and appreciate for the first time the richness and relevance of their Greek and Roman
inheritance. GE: ALS-L. Offered in alternate years.
